prepare_command:
touch  BuglyDynamic.framework/Modules/module.modulemap
cat <<-EOF > BuglyDynamic.framework/Modules/module.modulemap
framework module BuglyDynamic {
    header "Bugly.h"
    header "BuglyConfig.h"
    header "BuglyLog.h"
}
EOF
